benchmark_details.name: DigestDS
benchmark_details.overview: DigestDS is a novel dataset comprised of practical medical records from experienced experts in digestive system diseases, created to address the scarcity of high-quality clinical datasets for predicting Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) prescriptions.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To develop a high-quality prescription dataset for predicting herbal prescriptions in Traditional Chinese Medicine using large language models.

data.source: Clinical medical records collected from TCM specialists in digestive system disorders.
data.size: 16,896 samples for training, 2,057 samples for testing
data.annotation: Data was cleaned and filtered for essential information by experts.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on herbal prediction and dosage accuracy compared to actual prescriptions.
methodology.interpretation: Higher precision, recall, and F1 scores indicate better model performance in predicting herbs and dosages.
methodology.baseline_results: TCM-FTP achieved an F1-score of 0.8031 and a NMSE of 0.0604.
methodology.validation: Evaluated using expert assessments and quantitative comparison against baseline models.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Patient data was anonymized and irrelevant information was removed.
